typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		Address as string,
		Contact_BOID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Source
ChangeColumnNamesToParquetFormat alterRow(updateIf(true()),
	deleteIf(true()),
	upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
Source select(mapColumn(
		Name,
		Address,
		ContactBOID = Contact_BOID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ChangeColumnNamesToParquetFormat
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		Name as string,
		Address as string,
		Contact_Key as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Contact_Key'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Name,
		Address,
		Contact_Key = ContactBOID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkSQL
